title: SurveyWave
desc: SurveyWave is the online survey tool where user can easily survey any type of category. User can vote, report, like and dislike in survey category. User can payment monthly basis for become a pro user user and user can request to the admin for Surveyor role
Built_with: React, tailwind css, express js, MongoDB

title: GigForge
desc: Gigforge connects freelancers and clients for collaborative projects. Clients can rate and leave reviews for freelancers. Track project progress, earnings, and reviews. User can search and filter, project posting, messaging and bid the job
Built_with: React, tailwind css, express js, MongoDB

title: TechEra
desc: TechEra serves best tech products around the world. User can update and see details page.
Built_with: React, tailwind css, express js, MongoDB

title: Health Care
desc: In Health-Care you will find our best certified doctor. In this website people will see various types of services.
Built_with: React, tailwind css, express js, MongoDB
